hard: Nebula – Removes Fox marks to 2 closest allies. Satori won’t be able to one-shot these 2 allies.
Celeste – can remove Fox marks to hero with the least health left.
Rufus – Hard to kill tank for Satori and also provides a huge magic damage shield for the team
Cornelius – can oneshot Satori, decrease Satori’s ultimate skill level, decrease magic attack and increase magic defense for the team.
soft: Magic defense artifact – Satori relies on magic damage. Use Magic defense artifact to reduce Satori’s damage output.
